alert.note: Alert for Bates; Cass; Henry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 8:44AM CDT until March 24 at 7:22AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... South Grand River at Urich affecting Bates, Cass and Henry Counties. For the South Grand River...including Urich...Minor flooding is forecast. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Grand River at Urich. * WHEN...From this evening to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Flooding occurs across locations within 0.5 to 1.5 miles of the river. Areas affected include low lying pastures along with cropland and secondary roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 24.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu 1pm 1pm 1pm South Grand River Urich 24.0 21.2 Tue 8am 23.1 22.4 15.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
